function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Upper-room UV lights and negative air ionization might not be effective at preventing airborne tuberculosis transmission in humans.","Impact":"Increased risk of tuberculosis transmission between people in clinical settings.","Mitigation":"Further testing and validation of the effectiveness of these approaches in reducing tuberculosis transmission in human populations.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, HEPA filters, and UV-C air disinfection systems.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and other susceptible individuals in clinical settings.","Owner":"Hospital administrators, public health officials, and researchers."}]}
